name: Inferno
description: The Fire kitten, is an adventurous feline with blazing fur and an insatiable curiosity, known for its boundless energy and unwavering loyalty.

name: Crystal
description: The Ice kitten, possesses an enchanting frosty coat and a serene demeanor, bringing a sense of cool tranquility to its surroundings.
catchphrase: Every moment is as cool as ice!

name: Gaia
description: The Earth kitten with verdant green fur, embodies the lush vibrancy of nature, exuding a serene and grounding presence deeply connected to the natural world.

name: Zephyr
description: The Air kitten with pristine white wings, moves with grace and freedom, embodying the spirit of the wind as it soars through the skies.

name: Odin
description: The chief god in Norse mythology, recognized for his wisdom and distinctive one-eyed appearance.
catchphrase: Seek knowledge, and the path to wisdom shall reveal itself.

name: Thor
description: The mighty Norse god of thunder, known for his incredible strength and his magical hammer, Mjölnir.
catchphrase: By Mjölnir's might, I shall protect!

name: Loki
description: A cunning and mischievous trickster known for his shapeshifting abilities and his tendency to cause both chaos and occasional aid to the gods.

name: Brynhildr
description: A valkyrie known for her exceptional courage and her role in selecting fallen warriors to be taken to Valhalla by the gods.
catchphrase: Brave hearts, rise to the eternal halls!

name: Russell's teapot
description: A thought experiment illustrating the idea that the responsibility for providing evidence lies with the one making a claim, particularly when the claim cannot be easily proven or disproven.

name: Stellara Serpent
description: An ethereal cosmic creature, invisible to the human eye, which is believed to gracefully coil around distant stars, embodying the mystical beauty of the universe.
catchphrase: The celestial secrets coiled in starlight.

name: Etherian Whisper
description: An elusive and mystical being, barely perceptible, whose whispers hold the ethereal wisdom of unseen realms.
catchphrase: Listen closely to the whispers of the unseen.

name: Chaos Sprite
description: An invisible and mischievous entity known for its subtle disruptions of order, embodying the capricious nature of unseen forces.
catchphrase: Embrace the unexpected dance of chaos.
